EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_DevNexus_Atlanta_Q118.Post Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at DevNexus 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal and the Spring community at DevNexus <[[https://devnexus.com/]]>, and hope you’ll join us on the road at SpringOne Tour <[[http://springonetour.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devnexus-atlanta-q118]]> in cities all over the USA in 2018!
If you enjoyed learning how enterprises are adopting cloud-native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for their customers, we’d be happy to arrange a hands-on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devnexus-atlanta-q118]]> to begin a discussion.
In the meantime, if you are looking for spare capacity for CI builds, temporary development or test environments, get started on Pivotal Web Services <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devnexus-atlanta-q118]]>, a public Cloud Foundry instance great for running Spring (and .NET)! Don’t forget to download your free copy of the O’Reilly eBook, Migrating to Cloud Native Applications <[[http://pivotal.io/platform/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures-ebook?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devnexus-atlanta-q118]]> on the Pivotal site, a useful primer for IT management on why cloud-native matters.
Visit here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/devnexus-2018?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devnexus-atlanta-q118]]> for the latest in Spring, PIvotal and Cloud Foundry.
Join the conversation on our blogs <[[http://spring.io/blog?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devnexus-atlanta-q118]]>, podcasts <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-devnexus-atlanta-q118]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/springcentral]]>.
Thanks, The Spring Team at Pivotal
